name: 施勝雄
objective:
先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。
常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數、向量及向量空間、線性代數及矩陣
1. first order Ordinary Differential Equations
2. second order Differential equations
3. The laplace Transform
4. Series solutions
5. Vectors and vector spaces
6. Matrices and systems of linear equations
7. Determinants
8.Eigenvalues,Diagonalization,and Special Matrices
schedule:
第一週(9/7~9/13)
Chapter 1 First Order Differential Equations
1.1 Preliminary Concepts
1.2 Separable Equations
1.3 Linear Differential Equations
1.4 Exact Differential Equations 1.5 Integrating Factors
第二週(9/14~9/20)
1.6 Homogeneous, Bernoulli, and Reccati Equations
1.7 Applications of Electrical Circuits
第三週(9/21~9/27)
Ch2 Second Order Differential Equations
2.1 Preliminary Concepts
2.2 Theory of Solutions
2.3 Reduction of Order
第四週(9/28~10/4)
2.4 The Constant Coefficient Homogeneous Linear Equations
2.5 Euler Equations
第五週(10/5~10/11)
2.6 The Nonhomogeneous Equation
2.7 Application of Second Order Differential Equations
第六週(10/12~10/18)
Ch3 The Laplace Transform
3.1 Definition and Properties
3.2 Solution of Initial Value Problems Using Laplace Transform
第七週(10/19~10/25)
3.3 Shifting Theorems
3.4 Convolution Theorem
第八週(10/26~11/1)
3.5 Unit Impulses and The Dirac Delta Function

3.7 Differential Equations with Polynomial Coefficients
第九週(11/2~11/8)   期中考
第十週(11/9~11/15)
Ch4 Series Solution
4.1Power Series Solution of Initial Value Problems
4.2 Using Recurrence Relations
第十一週(11/16~11/22)

4.4 Second Solutions and Logarithm Factors
第十二週(11/23~11/29)
Ch6 Vectors and vector spaces
第十三週(11/30~12/6)
Ch7 Matrices and systems of linear equations
7.1 Matrices
7.2 Elementary row operation
7.3 Row Echelon Form of a Matrix
7.4 Rank of a Matrix
第十四週(12/7~12/13)
7.5 Solution of Homogeneous System of Linear Equations
7.6 Solution Space of AX=0
第十五週(12/14~12/20)
7.7 Solution Space of AX=B
7.8 Matrix Inverse
第十六週(12/21~12/27)
Ch8 Determinants.
第十七週(12/28~1/3)
Ch9 Eigenvalues,Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
9.1 Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
9.2 Diagonalization of a Matrix
9.3 Orthogonal and Symmetric Matrices
第十八週(1/4~1/10)
期末考
